Founded ReleaseTEAM in 1999, ReleaseTEAM is committed to providing custom Dev Ops/Software Configuration Management solutions based on our many years of experience and knowledge in the Engineering Discipline of DevOps, SCM, Continuous delivery/deployment. Specializing in tools like the Atlassian suite, Jira, Bamboo, Confluence, IBM Rational brand's ClearCase, ClearQuest, Rational Team Concert (RTC), Build Forge, Perforce Software's Helix, Jenkins, Chef, Artifactory, GitHub and GitLab.

Shawn's leadership in designing and implementing solutions is a strong asset, particularly when the problem isn't clearly defined.
